TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrayEditor extends System.ComponentModel.Design.CollectionEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing arrays at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This editor can be used to edit arrays within the design-time environment.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates applying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> to a property.
[!code-cpp[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ArrayEditorExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ArrayEditorExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ArrayEditorExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ArrayEditorExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The data type of the items in the array.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of using the specified data type for the array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Type CreateCollectionItemType() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the data type that this collection is designed to contain.
Docs.returns: A that indicates the data type that the collection is designed to contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation returns the item type of the array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object[] GetItems(object editValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The array from which to retrieve the items.
Docs.summary: Gets the items in the array.
Docs.returns: An array consisting of the items within the specified array. If the object specified in the parameter is not an array, a new empty object is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SetItems (object editValue, object[] value);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SetItems(object editValue, object[] value) cil managed

Docs.param: The array to set the items to.
The array of objects to set as the items of the array.
Docs.summary: Sets the items in the array.
Docs.returns: An instance of the new array. If the object specified by the parameter is not an array, the object specified by the parameter is returned.
